name: The Dragon Tamer
description:
Adds a character called The Dragon Tamer, who fights together with his faithful dragon.

- Adds 75 cards and 12 relics.

v1.1.0 (2020-12-06)
Card changes
- Light Shield rework: You gain 14(18) Block. Dragon gains 14(18) Block. Costs 1 less energy for each Bonding bonus you received this combat.
- Bizarre Tactic: Damage 4(6) -> 5(8)
- Deep Focus: Strength 5(7) -> 6(8)
- Fiery Synthesis: Damage 6(9) -> 5(8), Blaze Potion damage 30 -> 40
- Ghost Skin: Cost 1 -> 0
- Last Stand: Block 4(8) -> 5(10)
- Reckless Flurry: Cost 2(1) -> 1(0)
- Stun Trap: Cost 1(0) -> 0(0), Card draw 3(3) -> 2(4)

Dragon changes
All requirements for Tier 3 Dragons are reduced.
- Fierce Dragon: 4 -> 3 Burn cards
- Ancient Dragon: 3 -> 2 cards from other color (no longer counts Curses)
- Bird-Faced Dragon: 5 -> 4 Power cards
- Greedy Dragon: 30 -> 28 cards

Bug Fixes
- Fix macOS crash with Cleansing Strike or Adaptation. (Hopefully)

UI change
- Tactic cards now have 'Tactic' written next to their type
